item.title: Journaling
item.description: Daily Journal, Life Goals and Motivation Why do you want to keep a journal ? Positive Changes Specific Goals Daily Journal, Life Goals and Motivation Why do you want to keep a journal ? Think about why it will help you regardless of the goals you have. We will think about goals in question #3 below. Sometime I need someone to talk to.
